name: Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Ultimate Resource Bundle
name_original: Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Ultimate Resource Bundle
description:
The Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Ultimate Resource Bundle includes the following 22 DLCs:

  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Laxia's "Eternian Scholar" Costume
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Advanced Accessory Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Bottled Potion Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Castaway Start Dash Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Economy Ingredient Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Elixir Set 1
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Elixir Set 2
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Elixir Set 3
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Elixir Set 4
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Elixir Set 5
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Fish Bait Set 1
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Fish Bait Set 2
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Fish Bait Set 3
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Premium Material Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Ripe Fruit Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Status Recovery Set
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Tempest Set 1
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Tempest Set 2
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Tempest Set 3
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Tempest Set 4
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Tempest Set 5
  • Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Useful Accessory Set


Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Laxia's "Eternian Scholar" Costume Obtain an original costume exclusive for Laxia, "Eternian Scholar." Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Advanced Accessory Set You will obtain the following items:
Pirate Bandanna x1
Juggler Scarf x1
Tiger Claw x1
Eagle Fencer x1
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Bottled Potion Set You will obtain the following items:
Heal Potion x1
Full Potion x1
Great Tree Drop x1
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Castaway Start Dash Set You will obtain the following items:
Beautiful Flower x20
Sturdy Wood x20
Iron Ore x20
Mushroom Omelet x3
Meat Ratatouille x3
Colorful Meuniere x3
Bait x20
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Economy Ingredient Set You will obtain the following items:
Rock Salt x20
Honey x20
Seiren Wheat x20
Pheasant Egg x20
White Mushroom x20
Mual Clam x20
Red Meat x20
White Meat x20
Primitive Meat x20
Eggplant x20
Paprika x20
Cabbage x20

Queen Tomato x20
King Pumpkin x20
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Elixir Set 1 - 5 You will obtain the following items:
Life Elixir x3
Strength Elixir x3
Defense Elixir x3
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Fish Bait Set 1 A set of fish bait x100.
Fish love this spunky worm. A fishing must-have.
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Fish Bait Set 2 A set of fish bait x100. Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Fish Bait Set 3 A set of fish bait x100. Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Premium Material Set You will obtain the following items:
Tectite Ore x20
Energy Stone x20
Sunlight Fang x10
Lunar Wings x10
Starry Shell x10
Dragon Stone x10
Dragon Fang x5
Zaspion Tail x3
IVivine Bitters x3
Dornicle Shell x3
Dandeel Horn x3
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Ripe Fruit Set You will obtain the following items:
Ripe Wall Nut x10
Ripe Coco Palm x10
Ripe Mangoh x10
Dragon Jackpot x10
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Status Recovery Set You will obtain the following items:
Antidote x10
Antiparalytic x10
Eye Drop x10
Burn Medicine x10
Defrost Medicine x10
Hemostatic x10
Remedy x10
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Tempest Set 1 - 5 A set of 6 Tempest Elixirs.
Secret medicine holding the experience of its maker.
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA - Useful Accessory Set You will obtain the following items:
